#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
typedef struct _elem{
	
	char c;
	int val;
}elem;
 
elem A[200];
char str[200];
 
int comp(void *e1, void *e2){
	
	elem *a1 = (elem *)e1;
	elem *a2 = (elem *)e2;
 
	if(a1->val==a2->val) return 1;
 
	else return a1->val - a2->val;
 
}
 
int main(){
	
	int cases;
 
	scanf("%d", &cases);
 
	int i;
 
	for(i=0;i<cases;i++){
		
		scanf("%s", str);
 
		int j=0, ind=0;
		int score=0;
		for(j=0;j<strlen(str);j++){
			if(str[j]>='0' && str[j]<='9'){
				if(ind>0){
					A[ind-1].val -= score;
				}
				A[ind].c = str[j];
				A[ind].val = score;
				score=0;
				ind++;
			}
			else{
				switch(str[j]){
					case 'Z':
						score+=1;
						break;
					case 'Q':
						score+=3;
						break;
					case 'E':
						score+=5;
						break;
					case 'T':
						score+=7;
						break;
					case 'U':
						score+=9;
				}
			}
		}
 
		A[ind-1].val -=score;
		qsort(A, ind, sizeof(elem), comp);
		for(j=0;j<ind;j++)
			printf("%c",A[j].c);
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
